snippet.title: Hero's Hand - Official Announcement Trailer | Day of the Devs GDC 2025
snippet.description:
Embark on the ultimate Poker-Based Roguelike RPG Adventure! Hero’s Hand packs a strategic punch challenging you, the Knight of Spades, to gear up to save the land of Cardunia. Uncover the mystery of Mortis Numa and the rise of classic Dungeons and Taverns monsters that have infested the realm. Up the ante by leveling up, buying potions and scrolls, upgrading weapons and collecting powerful fortunes to be able to make it to Death’s Tower. 

Coming 2026

Steam (Wishlist) https://store.steampowered.com/app/3590630/Heros_Hand/

Developer: Villain
Website: www.villainhq.com

Discord:  https://discord.gg/qCDssNwTm2
X:  https://x.com/heroshand 
Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/heroshandgame/
TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@heroshand?lang=en
BlueSky:  https://bsky.app/profile/heroshand.bsky.social

#heroshand #poker #dungeonsanddragons #roguelike #rpg #gaming #steam #ps5 #xbox #switch #cartoon  #animation #DayOfTheDevs
